name: Retroween
description:
You shout aboid bats and catch candys. That's all. W,D or Arrows to moves. You can shake the screen to help youre self.

This is a small simple game. I will be grateful for any feedback and bug report, i would try to polish this game.

Refs: DoTween - http://dotween.demigiant.com/index.php

SFX - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/retro-games-sound-fx-27280#content
